mailSubject: Updated Checklist for J.P. MORGAN SECURITIES PLC
mailBody:
Dear Shubham,

I hope this message finds you well.

I wanted to inform you that the checklist for J.P. MORGAN SECURITIES PLC (LEI ID: K6Q0W1PS1L1O4IQL9C32) has been successfully updated. The final checklist now incorporates both the internal data and supplementary information retrieved, addressing all pending items.

Here’s a summary of the updated checklist:

- **Company Directorship**: No specific details are available in the annual report.
- **Company Tax Documentation**: No information regarding tax documentation is included in the annual report.
- **Company Business Scope**: Comprehensive details about the company’s financial services and corporate responsibilities have been provided.

The finalized checklist has been saved in JSON format and can be accessed at the following location: `kyc_json_store/K6Q0W1PS1L1O4IQL9C32/checklist_info.json`.

Please let me know if you need any further information or clarification.

Best regards,
Surbhi Nagori  
surbhi.nagori@capgemini.com
